import { memo, useState } from "react"; import Flex from "../Flex/Flex"; import { Accordion, AccordionItem, AccordionButton, AccordionPanel, AccordionIcon, Box } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import LinkButton from "../button/LinkButton"; import Button from "../button/button"; import EmployeeAttendance from "../../Pages/employeeAttendance/component" import EmployeeLeaving from "../../Pages/employeeLeaving/component"; //@ts-ignore import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import useLoacalStorage from '../../hooks/useLocalStorage'; const SideBar = () => { const { t } = useTranslation() const { displayName } = useLoacalStorage() const [modalProps, setModalProps] = useState({ }) const handleClickModal = (modal: string) => { setModalProps({ [modal]: true }) } const handleCloseModal = () => { setModalProps({}) } return ( <>

{t("aptl")}

 {displayName && {`${t("crntsrs")} ${displayName} `}}

{t("bscdat")}

{t("invcs")}

{t("emplys")}
